name: Creates an Alert in Opsgenie and send information to Google Sheets
description: When you create a new Alert at Opsgenie, Make will automatically add information about Alert to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/120lz8lJfXMrsLgz9UNV9VBy2Ra1qf4LhInkbTiK-V1A/edit?usp=sharing).
